properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
1. 10.7 METER S/V IDEFIX 2, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
   DISMASTED AND ADRIFT VICINITY 32-28.76S 012-57.41E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO CAPE TOWN RADIO,
   E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 36/14.
